author: chris-dollin
msg: Deleted dead triple-handling sink. Renamed UnlessTranslator to YUnless. Continued cleaning code.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Refactoring: Rule.Context has become TranslationContext and the fields

made private. Accesses to those fields have been replaced by method-calls doing the right thing with the accessed fields. Methods taking slices of the context -- eg, the howto and the offsets -- and using them individually have been revised to take a TranslationContext argument and use that instead.
